dcterms:creator: msancheznet
dcterms:description: A simulation platform for Delay Tolerant Networks (DTN) that allows for the modeling of traffic transmission between different system nodes and accurately represents the parameters of the system.
dcterms:title: DtnSim

dcterms:description: A routing strategy designed for Delay Tolerant Networks (DTN) that provides prior knowledge for routing in space-based networks.
dcterms:title: CGR (Contact Graph Routing)

dcterms:creator: J. A. Fraire
O. De Jonck`ere
S. C. Burleigh
dcterms:description: A contact plan designed for routing in the space internet, providing a framework for managing communications in Delay Tolerant Networks.
dcterms:title: NASA JPL Contact Plan

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
A. P. Badia
M. Mirza

dcterms:description: A set of algorithms for deep reinforcement learning that can be applied to various tasks, including network management.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement Learning Algorithms (A3C)

dcterms:creator: N. C. Luong
D. T. Hoang
S. Gong
D. Niyato
P. Wang
Y.-C. Liang
D. I. Kim
dcterms:description: A survey of various applications of deep reinforcement learning in communications and networking, providing insights into its effectiveness in these fields.
dcterms:title: Various RL Applications

dcterms:creator: Z. Wang
J. Zhang
X. Zhang
W. Wang
dcterms:description: A reinforcement learning-based algorithm for congestion control in satellite Internet of Things, addressing the challenges of resource management.
dcterms:title: Congestion Control Algorithm

dcterms:creator: P. G. Buzzi
D. Selva
M. S. Net
dcterms:description: A study on the use of reinforcement learning for autonomous management of delay tolerant networks, focusing on optimizing network performance.
dcterms:title: Autonomous Delay Tolerant Network Management

dcterms:creator: P. Garcia Buzzi
D. Selva
M. Sanchez Net
dcterms:description: An application of deep Q-learning for managing delay tolerant networks in a reactive imaging earth observing constellation.
dcterms:title: Deep Q-Learning for DTN Management
